com.google.android.glass.TMM

Class TextMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.google.android.glass.TMM.TextMenu

  • public class TextMenu
extends Activity
    Activity showing the options menu for the TextViewer activity. Provides the user with at minimum a way to exit the activity programmatically without using gestures.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String cardId
      The UUID of the audio card which is serving as the source for this textviewer activity.

      The position of the card within the cardscroll view from which the user launched this audioplayer activity.

    • Field Detail

      • TAG

        public static final java.lang.String TAG
        The Constant TAG. Used for the Android debug logger.

      • EXTRA_SELECTED_POS

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_SELECTED_POS
        The Constant EXTRA_SELECTED_POS. This is used for intent extra passing. Designed to map to the position of the selected card from the SelectCardActivity so that when the user returns to it, the card they just tapped on is in focus.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_SELECTED_ID

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_SELECTED_ID
        The Constant EXTRA_SELECTED_ID. This is used for intent extra passing. This maps to the String UUID of the card so that each activity my access it from the DB directly
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_LAST_TEXT_POS

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_LAST_TEXT_POS
        The Constant EXTRA_LAST_TEXT_POS. Used to alert the narrator what section to narrate.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_NARRATION_REQUESTED

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_NARRATION_REQUESTED
        The Constant EXTRA_REQUESTED_NARRATION. Used to retrieve a narration request from the menu intent.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_TEXT_POS

        public static final int DEFAULT_TEXT_POS
        The Constant DEFAULT_TEXT_POS. The default value to retrieve for the narrator - -1 is an error so nothing will be played.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_POS

        private static final int DEFAULT_POS
        The Constant DEFAULT_POS. Used if the position of the card in the SelectCardActivity cannot be obtained from the intent.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_NARR

        public static final boolean DEFAULT_NARR
        The Constant DEFAULT_NARR. Supplies the default narration setting to retrieve from the intent.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • lastPos

        private int lastPos
        The last pos selected before the user launched a menu. Designed to provide a way to do 'selective narration' of only segments of all the text.

      • cardPos

        private int cardPos
        The position of the card within the cardscroll view from which the user launched this audioplayer activity.

      • cardId

        private java.lang.String cardId
        The UUID of the audio card which is serving as the source for this textviewer activity.

      • isNarrating

        private boolean isNarrating
        Boolean flag to indicate if the user has selected a narration at the options menu. This is mostly used to govern the onmenuclosed behavior.

      • mAudioManager

        private AudioManager mAudioManager
        The audio manager used to provide audio feedback to the user in response to user actions.

      • closeTextViewer

        public static void closeTextViewer(Context context)
        Broadcasts an intent to close the textviewer activity quickly so that the user may return directly to the selectcardactivty directly from the menu activity
        Parameters:
        context - The activty's context, used to send a broadcast.

      • onOptionsMenuClosed

        public void onOptionsMenuClosed(Menu menu)
